website_summaries.verdict: One of the most highly rated Tug-of-War ropes on the market, this heavy-duty product provides remarkable rope length and durability.
pros: Made of durable, high-quality polyester weave
Comes in a variety of color options
100' length provides supreme fun and allows for multiple players
Features a loop end for tuggers working as the anchor
cons: Some buyers wished the rope was thicker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rope
customer_reviews.text: This item is durable and help up with during a field day event with adults. I'll even be able to use it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: jjs04

customer_reviews.title: Nice rope for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rope for Cub Scouts (1st - 5th graders). The rope is incredibly soft for little hands to hold. There are anchor loops as well as a center flag. Rope is a bit thick for younger kids (1st graders.) Overall, a very nice product. The description unfortunately doesn't label which colors represent which lengths. With the assumption that higher price means longer length, we bought the blue one (100').
customer_reviews.author: MSun

customer_reviews.title: Really fun.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. Cord is strong enough for 10 strong men at full welly. Soft enough for wee kids. Hardly feel any flex or give in it. I got the 100 footer. That's really long. More I visualized but I'd rather have extra than not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Turd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: It was great! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an activity at an outdoor weekend wedding at a summer camp. It was great! Sturdy, felt good on the hands, no sore fingers at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jmaca50

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Used this rope for a work event and had several Tug-O-Wars conducted on it. We found it to do its job very well and was the most reasonably priced we could find in the time frame we had. I donated it be used for further events and have not heard any complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: comicsvenom2002

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fantastic Quality Rope!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice rope! Very soft and comfortable on hands. Purchased for my 13 year old daughter’s bday party (about 12 girls and boys total) and they had a blast! Best part was when the kids competed against the parents, the rope length perfect for up to 10 people on each side, so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected- absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used it this weekend for my bootcamp. We had almost forty people pulling and it held perfectly! No one complained about it hurting their hands and it came with tied-in marking ribbons - so handy!!! Tug of war war the highlight of the day and this rope delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Tug of War rope
customer_reviews.text: Great Tug of War rope! Just as described and plenty soft enough. I purchased the RED (75') rope. Plenty of room for a 8v8 teen competition. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Study rope great for big groups.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our event. Sturdy and heavy rope! Great for big groups.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: We had a lot of fun at a festival with this thing
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun at a festival with this thing. If you have a bunch of morons or small kids who are going to yank on the ribbons, be prepared to lose them quickly. Aside from that, it is sturdy, and a pity that I so rarely see people playing this ancient game. What a bunch of losers we are.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Great product! I agree with other reviews, the material is soft to the touch and makes it enjoyable to compete.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun P. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought it for a party on the beach and it was a huge hit! So much so other people on the beach kept coming over to borrow it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very good weight rating light but very strong had five 300 lbs guys on both sides battling each other and it didn’t even break
customer_reviews.author: Chili Scott

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and very soft on hands
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a block party - kids ages 3 to adult joined in this. Very, very sturdy and very soft on hands. The little flags fell off right away, so that was the only little problem.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Tug-of-war Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it...long enough for at least 16 kids or more. Very thick but soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Soft and durable. Great value for the price. Used it for a field meet, had 40-50 kids (age 8 to 17) on each side with plenty of room (blue 100 ft rope).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love!! perfect rope, can't believe how well it is made
customer_reviews.author: Linda Furey

customer_reviews.title: good tug of war rope
customer_reviews.text: no hurt hands! a bit long, but that is easy to fix. No idea how to wash it......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is working out well. The diameter is a little small but it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: gilles auger

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and not hard on the hands
customer_reviews.text: This rope is long, sturdy and not hard on the hands. My family and I had so much fun playing tug of war! It's great for children and adults!
customer_reviews.author: G. Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Pay very close attention to the description. I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Pay very close attention to the description. I returned this product. For what it's worth, it did seem very well made...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: I never do ratings, ever. The sort of "rag rope" feel is amazingly soft on the hands. Works great for kids or adults. Can't beat it as a tug-of-war rope!
customer_reviews.author: Reality

customer_reviews.title: Used the tug of war rope for my kids (twins ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the tug of war rope for my kids (twins turning 7 years old) birthday party. The parents and kids had a blast. No complaints of hand burn.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J.

customer_reviews.title: One stars because it came on time... ...
customer_reviews.text: One stars because it came on time... However the second time used at a church picnic it broke in half. No joke it split in two.
customer_reviews.author: moochoo1

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded all expectations
customer_reviews.text: It was the hit of the cookout. I couldn't imagine getting a better rope. It is soft on the hands, good diameter for all ages we had kids as young as 4 or 5 and adults as big as 375 pounds yanking on this rope. We bought the Red 75 foot one it was plenty long to get at least 12 people on each side tugging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a good quality Tug of War rope you found it
customer_reviews.author: Dondrae Mills

customer_reviews.title: good times with family
customer_reviews.text: Was the peak point for a day at the park. Rope real soft for hands, was actually surprised taught was gonna be rough. The middle flags fell off, no big deal just used cones or line for threshold. About 20 people played and the rope didnt snap!! I guess the money was well spent. Chicken 29$, tshirt 20$,100ft blue rope 90$, good times with family....theres some things money cant buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thenku

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for Bible School and Church Camp
customer_reviews.text: Kids and adults both loved. Probably should have ordered a little shorter rope but worked well. No rope burns.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the purchase! Great quality and kids had fun. Holds up well and long enough to have many participants on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: debra s leimbach

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that the children I purchased this for would not be able to grip it well, they had no problems. This rope was a great addition to our family reunion fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Product is just what I expected. Great quality and price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for a fun adult "field day"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hit at my family bbq. Fit 8 big guys on each side and we could have prob gone with 9 but would have been tight.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Santiago

customer_reviews.title: We easily had 10 teenagers/adults on each end of rope
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rope for a tug-of-war competition with our youth group on a beach retreat. We easily had 10 teenagers/adults on each end of rope. The rope held up fine and there were zero complaints of rope burn after the tournament. It was a little spendy but worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: B. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! was a big hit at the family
customer_reviews.text: Great Product ! was a big hit at the family reunion
customer_reviews.author: Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality, anchor loops are great
customer_reviews.text: This is soft on hands and more fun than your average rope, because of the anchor loops on the ends; usually parents grab the ends to join in with the kids, and that makes it much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Higher Consciousness

customer_reviews.title: Great rope. Soft
customer_reviews.text: Great rope. Soft. Kids at 1st grade party LOVED it. Only issue was the "flags" were easily pulled out by kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt NYC

customer_reviews.title: The rope quality is great, The only thing that makes me mad is ...
customer_reviews.text: The rope quality is great, The only thing that makes me mad is that it said it was a75 foot unit, which is what i decided I wanted, so I paid more than the yellow one, and it is only 50 feet.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: and the service was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I expected and that was problematic for us. The delivery, the quality, and the service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri S.

customer_reviews.title: Rope worked great for my cub scout pack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the yellow rope for my cub scout pack and the boys loved it. The rope is easy for them to grip.
customer_reviews.author: cubmaster

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Tug of War Ropes
